message: The middleman-blog extension is not ready for public consumption, but it does exist and is in use on a handful of sites as we work out the kinks. If you're brave, you can use my blog as a tutorial (https://github.com/tdreyno/awardwinningfjords). Full support (including docs) is scheduled for the 2.1 release of middleman in the next couple months where it will be one of the primary "new" features.

When you say it's not ready for public release just yet is it stable enough for the most part. I'm definitely looking forward to giving it a try. I'll take a look through your blog and see how far I get. Are there any particular kinks I should be aware of?
Basically, there is no documentation and the options are simply the ones I needed. That said, it is stable and running several blogs around the web.
